title: Why exactly do we call them "Marksmen" ?

replies.body: Well they never miss a normal attack, so...that's a marksman.

> [{quoted}](name=ChompyWulf,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Q1s0EEeA,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-04-15T22:06:46.876+0000)

> Well they never miss a normal attack, so...that's a marksman.

Ok, that was actually funny as fuck LOL

Ahhh... look up what Marksman means.

marks·man
ˈmärksmən/
noun
noun: marksman; plural noun: marksmen
a person skilled in shooting, especially with a pistol or rifle.
"a police marksman"
synonyms:
sniper, sharpshooter, good shot; More

----------------

As far as a description of the CHAMPION's role? It's exactly per wrote.
